name: Policies with any other program should be defaulted as 'Direct bill', user can select the 'Wholesale bill' wherever applicable

testSteps.description: 1: Policies with any other program should be defaulted as 'Direct bill', user can select the 'Wholesale bill' wherever applicable ({program=Amazon})

children.description: Given underwriter has ability to create quote
And with program name is 'Amazon'
When underwriter calculates premium for quote
And underwriter is on home page
And underwriter opens newly created 'quote'
When underwriter navigates to Payment Plan

Then Bill type should have following options
| Direct Bill |
| Wholesale Bill |
